title: Looking for any Old Judges (or any 19th cent. card) of Kansas City players
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Looking for any Old Judges (or any 19th cent. card) of Kansas City players
posts.post_content:
Would prefer lowergrade but want the card to be reasonably presentable with a decent photo too.  I have plenty to trade if anyone would like to go that route. Here is an Old Judge checklist for KC players if that helps...

Thanks much!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Jaime Burns 
Samual Barkley 
Nick Bradley
Jimmy Burns
Count Campau
Jumbo Cartwright
Monk Cline
James Conway
Law Daniels
Jumbo Davis
James Donahue
Henry Esterday
Chingers Fagan
Josephy Gunson
William Hafner
Billy Hamilton (HOF) 
Frank Hankinson
William Hasamdear
Charles Hoover 
John Johnson
Germany Long 
Jimmy Manning 
John McCarthy
Chippy McGarr (umpire) 
Jame McTamany
James Phillips
John Pickett
Henry Porter –
Charles Reynolds
Davis Roe (mgr) 
John Sowders – 
Daniel Stearns
Park Swartzel –
Stephen Toole 
Bill Watkins (mgr) – 
Jake Wells

Brian-I have some KC dups. What are you paying or what do you have to trade? In terms of trade material I would be interested in 1880's team cabinets or other Old Judge cards. Please respond to [url]jay.l.miller@jpmorgan.com[/url]

Best---Jay
